content.description: A block of unknown mass is fully submerged in Fluid <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> of density <math alttext="rho sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. The block remains in place when it is released. The same block is then placed in Fluid <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2</mn> </math> of density <math alttext="rho sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. The block floats in Fluid <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> with half of the volume of the block submerged in the fluid, as shown in the figure.
content.question: Which of the following correctly indicates the ratio <math alttext="the fraction with numerator rho sub 1, and denominator rho sub 2" overflow="scroll"> <mfrac> <msub> <mi>ρ</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mi>ρ</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> </mfrac> </math>?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
